content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position (5.0, 5.0)
Used to process iron ore into iron plates by utilizing coal. This structure (a furnace unit located at (5.0, 5.0)) was employed during the recovery update for enabling lab crafting by increasing the iron-plate count.

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position (-27.0, -60.0)
Used to process copper ore into copper plates. The furnace unit at (–27.0, –60.0) is dedicated to copper plate production, which is a prerequisite for generating copper cables needed in subsequent lab crafting attempts.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Parameter Mismatch – The calls to get_entities failed due to incorrect argument usage. Ensure the function is invoked with parameters matching its expected signature (avoid unsupported keywords like “radius” and verify the number of positional arguments).

• Lab Crafting and Placement Failures – Multiple errors occurred when attempting to supply or craft a Lab:
  – Validate that a Lab exists in the inventory before trying to place it.
  – When retrieving labs from the map, check that the returned value is iterable (fallback to an empty list if None) to prevent type errors.
  – Confirm that all required sub-ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheels derived from iron plates and components like copper-cables for electronic circuits) are sufficiently available before initiating lab crafting.

• Resource Chain Shortages – Errors in lab production were compounded by missing components. Prioritize the production or smelting of crucial sub-ingredients (iron plates, copper plates, and processed copper cables) to facilitate successful lab crafting in future recovery updates.
